english: This is something I need to do alone.

spanish: Tom siguió cavando.
english: Tom continued digging.

spanish: Necesito unas tijeras.
english: I need scissors.

spanish: Levanta la mano si tienes alguna pregunta.
english: Raise your hand if you have a question.

spanish: No necesito dinero.
english: I don't need money.

spanish: Siga leyendo.
english: Keep reading.

spanish: ¿Es esta la razón por la que no quisiste venir conmigo?
finnish: Onko tämä syy siihen, ettet halunnut tulla kanssani?
english: Is this the reason you didn't want to come with me?

spanish: Tom no sería tan estúpido.
english: Tom wouldn't be that stupid.

spanish: El jardinero era el asesino.
english: The gardener was the murderer.

spanish: Tom casi nunca se queja de nada.
english: Tom almost never complains about anything.

spanish: No necesitamos nada más.
english: We don't need anything else.

spanish: Voy a la iglesia.
english: I'm going to church.

spanish: Si vas a actuar de esa manera yo me voy.
finnish: Jos tulet käyttäytymään tuolla tapaa, minä lähden.
english: If you're going to act like that, I'm leaving.

spanish: Si yo fuera rica, iría al extranjero.
english: If I were rich, I'd go abroad.

spanish: Tom ya no lo necesitaba.
english: Tom didn't need it anymore.

spanish: ¿Por qué sigue habiendo guerras en el mundo?
english: Why are there still wars in the world?

spanish: Solo estoy siendo educado.
english: I'm just being polite.

spanish: Tom volvió afuera.
english: Tom went back outside.

spanish: Siempre estoy cansada.
english: I'm always tired.

spanish: Siempre estoy cansado.
english: I'm always tired.

spanish: Un hombre no siempre puede ser un héroe, pero siempre puede ser un hombre.
finnish: Mies ei aina voi olla sankari, mutta hän voi aina olla mies.
english: A man can't always be a hero, but he can always be a man.

spanish: Honestamente hablando, sus discursos son siempre aburridos.
finnish: Totta puhuen, hänen puheensa ovat aina tylsiä.
english: Frankly speaking, his speeches are always dull.

spanish: ¿Estoy hablando demasiado rápido?
english: Am I speaking too quickly?

spanish: Él casi se ahogó en el río.
english: He almost drowned in the river.

spanish: Ella casi se ahogó en el río.
english: She almost drowned in the river.

spanish: Él siempre dice cosas malas de su esposa.
finnish: Hän sanoo aina ilkeitä asioita vaimostaan.
english: He's always saying bad things about his wife.

spanish: ¡Pero si tu ex es una psicópata!
english: But your ex is a psychopath!

spanish: Tienes que tener siempre las manos limpias.
finnish: Sinun täytyy pitää aina kätesi puhtaina.
english: You must always keep your hands clean.

spanish: No digo que tus respuestas siempre sean incorrectas.
finnish: En sano että vastauksesi aina ovat väärin.
english: I'm not saying that your answers are always wrong.

spanish: Ellos necesitan un poco de instrucción.
english: They need a little instruction.

spanish: No sé si puedo hacerlo.
english: I don't know if I can do it.

spanish: Te aseguro que no lo hice a propósito.
finnish: Vakuutan sinulle etten tehnyt sitä tahallani.
english: I assure you that I did not do it purposely.

spanish: Me siento tan sola.
english: I feel so lonely.

spanish: Espero que no haya sido demasiado problema.
finnish: Toivon ettei siitä ollut liian paljon vaivaa.
english: I hope it wasn't too much trouble.

spanish: Todos los doctores dicen que yo no debo tomar café, y sin embargo bebo un poco de vez en cuando en buena compañía.
finnish: Kaikki lääkärit sanovat, että minä en saa juoda kahvia, mutta minä juon kuitenkin vähän silloin tällöin mukavassa seurassa.
english: All the doctors say that I shouldn't drink coffee, but, despite that, I do have a bit now and then when I'm in good company.

spanish: Quiero vivir mi vida sin estrés y preocupaciones. No necesito ser rico y famoso, sólo quiero ser feliz...
finnish: Haluan elää elämäni ilman stressiä ja huolia. Minun ei tarvitse olla rikas ja kuuluisa, haluan vain olla onnellinen...
english: I want to live my life without stress and worries. I don't need to be rich or famous, I just want to be happy.

spanish: El joven al que contraté como mi asistente trabaja muy duro.
finnish: Nuori mies, jonka palkkasin assistentikseni, työskentelee kovasti.
english: The young man whom I employed as my assistant works very hard.

spanish: Me gustaría estudiar química en la universidad.
english: I'd like to study chemistry at college.

spanish: Cuando probé explicarle mis motivos, él simplemente se puso más furioso.
finnish: Kun yritin selittää syitäni, hän yksinkertaisesti tuli vielä vihaisemmaksi.
english: When I tried to explain my reasons he simply became even angrier.

spanish: Científicos lo consideran un invento importante.
english: Scientists regard the discovery as important.

spanish: Debido a la televisión, niños y niñas no quieren leer libros.
finnish: Television vuoksi pojat ja tytöt eivät halua lukea kirjoja.
english: Because of TV, boys and girls don't want to read books.

spanish: No necesitas decidir ahora mismo.
finnish: Sinun ei tarvitse päättää juuri nyt.
english: You don't have to decide right now.

spanish: No sé casi nada.
english: I know next to nothing.

spanish: Necesito un cuarto más grande.
english: I need a larger room.

spanish: Los caballos son animales muy sensibles.
english: Horses are very sensitive animals.

spanish: Necesito mis gafas.
english: I need my glasses.

spanish: Ella se metió la llave al bolsillo.
english: She put the key in her pocket.

spanish: Los plátanos son exquisitos.
english: Bananas are delicious.

spanish: No sé si puedo ir ahí o no.
finnish: En tiedä, voinko mennä sinne vai en.
english: I don't know whether I can go there or not.

spanish: El presidente Truman tuvo que tomar una difícil decisión.
finnish: Presidentti Trumanin oli pakko tehdä vaikea päätös.
english: President Truman had to make a difficult decision.

spanish: Él siempre tiene razón.
english: He is always right.

spanish: Tom no podrá terminar el trabajo a menos que lo ayudemos.
finnish: Tom ei pysty tekemään työtä loppuun, ellemme auta häntä.
english: Tom won't be able to finish the job unless we help him.

spanish: Espero que pueda ayudarte en otra ocasión.
finnish: Toivon että pystyn auttamaan sinua joskus toiste.
english: I hope that I will be able to help you at some other time.

spanish: Si voy a la fiesta llevaré algunas botellas de vino.
finnish: Jos menen juhliin, otan muutaman pullon viiniä.
english: If I go to the party, I'll take some bottles of wine.

spanish: El asesinato es un crimen contra la humanidad.
english: Murder is a crime against humanity.

spanish: Voy a devolver este suéter porque es demasiado grande.
finnish: Tulen palauttamaan tämän neulepuseron, koska se on liian iso.
english: I am going to return this sweater because it's too big.

spanish: Ellos no lo consideran adecuado para el trabajo.
finnish: He pitivät häntä epäpätevänä tätä työtä varten.
english: They consider him unfit for the job.

spanish: No siempre voy a estar ahí para ti.
finnish: En ole aina olemassa sinua varten.
english: I'm not always going to be there for you.

spanish: ¿Acaso sería justo con los demás?
english: Would it be fair to the others?

spanish: Ni siquiera sé cuál es el apellido de Tom.
finnish: En edes tiedä mikä Tomin sukunimi on.
english: I don't even know what Tom's last name is.

spanish: Ni siquiera sé dónde vive Tom.
finnish: En edes tiedä missä Tom asuu.
english: I don't even know where Tom lives.

spanish: Ella no vivió un solo día de su vida sin violencia.
finnish: Hän ei elänyt yhtäkään päivää elämästään ilman väkivaltaa.
english: She didn't live a single day of her life without violence.

spanish: ¿Cuánto es demasiado?
english: How much is too much?

spanish: Estos zapatos son demasiado caros.
english: These shoes are too expensive.

spanish: Estos zapatos son caros, y más encima, son demasiado chicos.
finnish: Nämä kengät ovat kalliit, ja muutenkin ne ovat liian pienet.
english: These shoes are expensive, and what is more, they are too small.

spanish: Tom siempre nos engaña. No confío en él.
finnish: Tom pettää meidät aina. En luota häneen.
english: Tom always deceives us; I don't trust him.

spanish: El mundo moderno no es dominado por personas, sino por ideas.
finnish: Modernia maailmaa eivät hallitse ihmiset vaan ideat.
english: The modern world isn't governed by people, but by ideas.

spanish: Las moscas zumban sin descanso.
english: The flies buzz restlessly.

spanish: Jane es gorda, grosera y fuma demasiado. Pero Ken piensa que ella es adorable y encantadora. Es por eso que dicen que el amor es ciego.
finnish: Jane on lihava, töykeä ja polttaa liikaa. Mutta Kenistä hän on ihana ja hurmaava. Siksi rakkautta sanotaankin sokeaksi.
english: Jane is fat and rude, and smokes too much. However, Ken thinks she's lovely and charming. That's why they say love is blind.

spanish: Iré afuera a ver los fuegos artificiales.
english: I'll go out and see the fireworks.

spanish: Linda fue al parque a escuchar música.
english: Linda went to the park to listen to music.

spanish: Pensar rápido previno que el daño fuera aún peor.
finnish: Nopea ajattelu esti vauriota olemasta vielä pahempi.
english: Quick thinking prevented the damage from being even worse.

spanish: Es ilegal copiar libros sin permiso del autor.
finnish: On laitonta kopioida kirjoista ilman kirjailijan lupaa.
english: It is illegal to copy from books without the author's permission.

spanish: En Asia, el francés a menudo es asociado con el romance.
finnish: Aasiassa ranskan kieli yhdistetään usein romantiikkaan.
english: In Asia, the French language is often associated with romanticism.

spanish: Hola, quisiera un poco de fresco jugo de naranja.
english: Hello, I would like some fresh orange juice.

spanish: ¡Todos afuera!
english: Everybody out!

spanish: ¡No digas groserías!
english: Don't swear!

spanish: No hace falta sacar conclusiones precipitadas.
finnish: Ei ole tarpeen vetää hätiköityjä johtopäätöksiä.
english: There is no need to draw a hasty conclusion.

spanish: Lo siento, olvidé tu nombre.
english: I'm sorry, I forgot your name.

spanish: Si realmente quieres saber, solo debes preguntar.
finnish: Jos haluat oikeasti tietää, sinun täytyy vain kysyä.
english: If you really want to know, all you have to do is ask.

spanish: Eso depende del tamaño de la silla.
english: It depends on the size of the chair.

spanish: ¿Cuál es la profesión de Tom?
english: What's Tom's profession?

spanish: Tom sigue lamentando la muerte de su perro.
english: Tom is still lamenting the death of his dog.

spanish: Tom es un mentiroso si dice que nos vio juntos.
finnish: Tom on valehtelija, jos hän sanoo, että hän näki meidät yhdessä.
english: Tom is a liar if he says he saw us together.

spanish: Si estás aburrido, sugiero que vayas al cine.
finnish: Jos sinulla on tylsää, ehdotan, että menet elokuviin.
english: If you're bored, I suggest you go to the cinema.

spanish: Tom sacó un papel doblado del bolsillo de su camisa.
finnish: Tom otti paitansa taskusta taitellun paperin.
english: Tom took a folded piece of paper out of his shirt pocket.

spanish: Tom puso su teléfono en su bolsillo.
english: Tom put his phone in his pocket.

spanish: Esa compañía ha sido muy exitosa hasta ahora.
finnish: Tuo firma on menestynyt tähän mennessä erittäin hyvin.
english: That company has been very successful up to now.

spanish: Ellos necesitan dinero para pagar los materiales.
english: They need money to pay for the materials.

spanish: Casi obtuve puntuación perfecta.
english: I almost got a perfect score.

spanish: Casi saqué todo el puntaje.
english: I almost got a perfect score.

spanish: ¿Por qué no se consiguen tú y Tom algo para comer?
finnish: Miksette sinä ja Tom hanki jotakin syötävää?
english: Why don't you and Tom get something to eat?

spanish: La situación era extremadamente peligrosa; era cuestión de vida o muerte.
finnish: Tilanne oli erittäin vaarallinen, oli kyse elämästä tai kuolemasta.
english: The situation was extremely dangerous; it was a matter of life and death.

spanish: Los frenos del frente no sirven.
english: The front brakes don't work.

spanish: Tom tenía una expresión de susto en la cara.
english: Tom had a scared look on his face.

spanish: Tom había bebido demasiado café así que no pudo dormir.
finnish: Tom oli juonut liian paljon kahvia eikä voinut nukkua.
english: Tom had drunk too much coffee so he couldn't sleep.

spanish: Quisiera pasar algunos días con Tom.
finnish: Haluaisin viettää muutaman päivän Tomin kanssa.
english: I'd like to spend a few days with Tom.

spanish: La estrella más cercana a nuestro sistema solar es Próxima Centauri.
finnish: Aurinkokuntamme lähin tähti on Proxima Centauri.
english: The nearest star to our solar system is Proxima Centauri.

spanish: No creo que eso sea posible.
english: I don't think that's possible.

spanish: Estábamos afuera.
english: We were outside.

spanish: Deberíamos tratar a los otros con sinceridad.
english: We should treat others with sincerity.

spanish: Su historia era bastante simple.
english: His story was pretty simple.

spanish: Hoy ha sido extremadamente aburrido.
english: Today has been extremely lame.

spanish: Lo que más me impresiona de China es la comida china.
finnish: Mikä tekee minuun suurimman vaikutuksen Kiinassa on kiinalainen ruoka.
english: What impresses me the most about China is Chinese food.

spanish: Son solo las cinco de la mañana, y sin embargo afuera es de día.
finnish: Kello on vasta viisi aamulla, mutta joka tapauksessa ulkona on valoisaa.
english: It's just five in the morning, but nevertheless it is light out.

spanish: El francés de Tom es casi perfecto.
english: Tom's French is almost perfect.

spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo piensas quedarte aquí en Brasil?
finnish: Kuinka kauaksi aiot jäädä tänne Brasiliaan?
english: How long do you intend to stay here in Brazil?

spanish: Ella te necesita.
english: She needs you.

spanish: A causa de la lluvia no jugamos tenis afuera.
finnish: Sateen takia emme pelanneet tennistä ulkona.
english: Because of the rain, we didn't play tennis outside.

spanish: Comprendí que necesitaba ayuda.
english: I realized I needed help.

spanish: Lo importante no es ganar el juego, sino participar.
finnish: Tärkeätä ei ole voittaa peli vaan ottaa osaa siihen.
english: The important thing is not to win the game, but to take part in it.

spanish: Lo que cuenta no es lo que dices, sino lo que haces.
finnish: Ei se mitä sanot vaan teet on mitä lasketaan.
english: It's not what you say, but what you do that counts.

spanish: Si solo supiera de que se tratan todas esas cosas.
finnish: Jospa vain tietäisin mitä kaikki nuo asiat koskevat.
english: If only I knew what those things are all about.

spanish: Es posible que la víctima esté herida en la cabeza.
finnish: On mahdollista että uhri on haavoittunut päähän.
english: It's possible that the victim is wounded in the head.

spanish: Por favor, cuéntanos por qué necesitas quedarte aquí.
finnish: Ole hyvä ja kerro miksi sinun tarvitsee jäädä tänne.
english: Please tell us why you need to stay here.

spanish: Necesito el dinero de Tom.
english: I need Tom's money.

spanish: La explosión sacudió todo el edificio.
english: The explosion shook the whole building.

spanish: Es todo menos imposible.
finnish: Se on kaikkea muuta kuin mahdotonta.
english: It's all but impossible.

spanish: Tu voz para mí es como el canto de la sirena.
finnish: Äänesi on minulle kuin seireenin laulua.
english: The sound of your voice is like a siren's song to me.

spanish: Estos audífonos no sirven.
english: These earphones don't work.

spanish: Tom ni siquiera estaba asustado.
english: Tom wasn't even scared.

spanish: Él es pésimo en matemáticas.
english: He is terrible at math.

spanish: ¿Quién soy? ¿De dónde vengo? ¿Hay vida después de la muerte? ¿Cuál es el significado de la vida?
finnish: Kuka minä olen? Mistä minä tulen? Onko kuoleman jälkeen elämää? Mikä on elämän tarkoitus?
english: Who am I? Where do I come from? Is there life after death? What is the meaning of life?

spanish: Consigan un martillo y clavos.
english: Get a hammer and nails.

spanish: Quisiera verlo.
english: I'd like to see it.

spanish: Si necesitas dinero, yo te paso.
finnish: Jos tarvitset rahaa, lainaan sitä sinulle.
english: If you need any money, I'll lend you some.

spanish: No puedo imaginar la vida sin él.
finnish: En voi kuvitella elämää ilman häntä.
english: I can't imagine life without him.

spanish: No puedo imaginar vivir sin ella.
finnish: En voi kuvitella elää ilman häntä.
english: I can't imagine life without her.

spanish: Ella es demasiado joven para entender.
english: She's too young to understand.

spanish: Él es demasiado joven para entender.
english: He's too young to understand.

spanish: Eres demasiado joven para entender.
english: You're too young to understand.

spanish: Estas noticias son demasiado buenas para ser ciertas.
finnish: Nämä uutiset ovat liian hyviä ollakseen tosia.
english: This news is too good to be true.

spanish: Debemos obedecer las leyes de tránsito.
english: We should obey the traffic rules.

spanish: Si terminaste de leer el libro, devuélvelo a la biblioteca.
finnish: Jos olet lukenut kirjan loppuun, palauta se kirjastoon.
english: If you have finished reading the book, return it to the library.

spanish: No va a la iglesia.
english: He doesn't go to church.

spanish: Si eres una buena niña, te daré dulces.
finnish: Jos olet kiltti tyttö, annan sinulle nameja.
english: If you are a good girl, you shall have candy.

spanish: Se me asignó un nuevo dormitorio.
english: A new room was assigned to me.

spanish: Todo conductor debe obedecer las normas de tránsito.
english: Every driver must follow the traffic rules.

spanish: Sería un desastre.
english: It'd be a disaster.

spanish: ¿Qué pasará la semana siguiente?
english: What's happening next week?

spanish: Él hizo eso a propósito.
english: He did that on purpose.

spanish: Soy sensible.
english: I'm sensitive.

spanish: Quiero vivir en Brasil.
english: I want to live in Brazil.

spanish: Tom dijo que puede conseguirnos lo que necesitamos.
finnish: Tom sanoi, että hän voi hankkia meille sen mitä tarvitsemme.
english: Tom said he can get us what we need.

spanish: Tom dijo que quisiera otra taza de café.
finnish: Tom sanoi, että hän haluaisi toisen kupillisen kahvia.
english: Tom said he'd like to have another cup of coffee.

spanish: Tom dice que él puede conseguirte lo que necesitas.
finnish: Tom sanoo, että hän voi hankkia sinulle sen mitä tarvitset.
english: Tom says he can get you what you need.

spanish: El mundo moderno no es gobernado por gente, sino por ideas.
finnish: Modernia maailmaa eivät hallitse ihmiset vaan ideat.
english: The modern world isn't governed by people, but by ideas.

spanish: Tom me dijo que podía conseguirnos lo que necesitamos.
finnish: Tom kertoi minulle, että hän voi hankkia meille mitä tarvitsemme.
english: Tom told me that he could get us what we need.

spanish: Agradecemos tu ayuda, aún si solo es una gota en el mar de nuestras necesidades.
finnish: Olemme kiitollisia avustasi, vaikka se onkin vain pisara tarpeidemme valtameressä.
english: We're grateful for your help although it's just a drop in the ocean of our needs.

spanish: Terminaré la tarea, sin importar cuánto tarde.
finnish: Huolimatta siitä kuinka kauan se kestää, teen työn valmiiksi.
english: No matter how long it takes, I will finish the work.

spanish: No sé decir si Tom está bromeando o no.
finnish: En osaa sanoa vitsaileeko Tom vai ei.
english: I can't tell if Tom is joking or not.

spanish: A mi hermano le interesa aquello que llaman música pop.
finnish: Veljeni on kiinnostunut siitä, mitä sanotaan popmusiikiksi.
english: My brother likes what they call pop music.

spanish: No has iniciado sesión.
english: You are not logged in.

spanish: John está bebiendo demasiado estos días.
english: These days John drinks too much.

spanish: Necesitaré algunos minutos.
english: I'll need a few minutes.

spanish: El invierno pasado en Helsinki nevó más de setenta centímetros de nieve.
finnish: Helsingissä satoi viime talvena yli seitsemänkymmentä senttimetriä lunta.
english: More than seventy centimetres of snow fell in Helsinki last year.

spanish: El restaurante estaba casi vacío.
english: The restaurant was almost empty.

spanish: Tom se levantó de su asiento.
english: Tom got up from his seat.

spanish: Sé que piensas que esto es demasiado caro.
finnish: Tiedän, että luulet tämän olevan liian kallis.
english: I know you think this is too expensive.

spanish: ¿Tom siempre ha estado gordo?
english: Has Tom always been fat?

spanish: Nunca he sido más feliz.
english: I've never been happier.

spanish: Quisiera ver los árboles de donde agarraste estas manzanas.
finnish: Haluaisin nähdä puut, joista poimit nämä omenat.
english: I would like to see the trees from which you picked these apples.

spanish: Nos meteremos en problemas si nos pillan.
english: We'll get in trouble if we get caught.

spanish: ¿Cuándo sale el próximo bus a Helsinki?
english: When does the next bus to Helsinki leave?

spanish: Él es un tipo muy simpático.
english: He's a very nice guy.

spanish: Quisiera ir a ver una película.
english: I'd like to go see a movie.

spanish: Tú quieres que consiga un mejor trabajo, pero no creo que pueda.
finnish: Haluat, että hankin paremman työn, mutta en usko, että voin.
english: You want me to get a better job, but I don't think I can.

spanish: Eres un poco demasiado viejo para mí.
english: You're a little too old for me.

spanish: ¿Dijo Tom cuándo vendría de visita?
finnish: Sanoiko Tom milloin hän tulisi kylään?
english: Did Tom say when he'd come to visit?

spanish: Él sacó una moneda de su bolsillo.
english: He took out a coin from his pocket.

spanish: Para hacer dinero necesitas dinero.
english: You need money to make money.

spanish: Si debes matar, mata a un elefante, si debes robar, roba un tesoro.
finnish: Jos sinun täytyy tappaa, tapa elefantti ja jos sinun täytyy ryöstää, ryöstä aarre.
english: If you must kill, kill an elephant and if you must rob, rob a treasury.

spanish: No necesitaba ir.
english: She didn't need to go.

spanish: Tienes que tomar la decisión correcta.
english: You have to make the right choice.

spanish: Tom está afuera jugando frisbee con su perro.
finnish: Tom on ulkona heittelemässä frisbeetä koiransa kanssa.
english: Tom is outside playing frisbee with his dog.

spanish: Ni siquiera nos conocemos.
english: We don't even know each other.

spanish: Tom está casi listo.
english: Tom is almost ready.

spanish: Rob, ve a ver televisión.
english: Rob, go watch TV.

spanish: Me acuerdo como si hubiera sido ayer.
english: I remember it as if it were yesterday.

spanish: Llévate un mapa en caso de que te pierdas.
finnish: Ota kartta mukaasi siltä varalta, että eksyt.
